org.jsonschema2pojo

Class Jackson2Annotator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsonschema2pojo.Jackson2Annotator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Annotator

    public class Jackson2Annotator
extends Object
implements Annotator
    Annotates generated Java types using the Jackson 2.x mapping annotations.
    See Also:
    https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-annotations

      • isAdditionalPropertiesSupported

        public boolean isAdditionalPropertiesSupported()
        Description copied from interface: Annotator
        Indicates whether the annotation style that this annotator uses can support the JSON Schema 'additionalProperties' feature. In other words, can the deserializer associated with this annotation style gather unexpected, additional json properties and does it expect to include them somewhere in the target Java instance.

        Jackson is able to use it's JsonAnyGetter and JsonAnySetter features for this purpose, hence for Jackson annotators, this method will return true. Gson does not support 'additional' property values (they are silently discarded at deserialization time), hence for Gson annotators, this method would return false.

        Specified by:
        isAdditionalPropertiesSupported in interface Annotator
        Returns:
        Whether this annotator has any way to support 'additional properties'.
